title: Ranked Flex Promo Unsuccessful 0-1 (Bug???)

embed.description: @RiotSupport apparently I just lost my promo series 0-1??????

body:
Playing Ranked Flex, made it into my Bronze 5 promo (hur hur b5) and it failed my promos instantly after losing only 1 match. I got into the promo with Morgana, then lost with Lee Sin and it just said i was unsuccessful with my series. It should be best of 3 but i failed 0-1.

I was playing with Angelstar both games, we entered promos at the same time and she is still in her series 0-1 while I'm down at 81 LP.
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}} 
y dis happen rito

replies.body: Did you dodge any champ selects? Or cause a remake? Both of these count as losses while you are on promos, and if your friend was not flagged as afk as well (in the case of a remake) and wasn't the one that dodged the select then they would not see the losses you are.
No, those two games were right after each other. No dodges/remakes. Neither of us were afk.
